WorkItem.Description:
Very strange behaves excelreader with simple xlsx files.
The problem occurs when i trying to read file, which contains 3 pages.

In the first page are 10 columns, which has data validation by named ranges and five filled rows.
The second page contains definitions of those named ranges. 
The 3rd page contains about five example-rows, which has no data validation.
Rows in first and third page are styled(thin borders on every side).

When i trying to read the file, script is silently halts.
If you turn off the styles, script works correctly
